mapper.select: SELECT A.id, A.order_id AS orderId, A.commodity_no AS commodityNo, A.amount, A.listprice, A.totalprice, B.name AS commodityName, B.pictureurl FROM orderitem A INNER JOIN commodity B ON A.commodity_no=B.commodity_no WHERE A.order_id=#{orderId}

SELECT orders.id, order_no, user_id, totalamount, orders.store_no, store.storename, orders.states, paymenttype, paymentsubtype, deliverytype, createtime, orders.user_id, user.username, user.phone, orders.address, receiver, phonenumber FROM orders INNER JOIN store ON orders.store_no=store.store_no INNER JOIN user ON orders.user_id=user.id WHERE order_no=#{orderNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE orders SET states=#{states} WHERE order_no=#{order_no}
